mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.license AS "license", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_license a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM sys_license a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_license( id, license, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{license}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id} )
INSERT INTO sys_license( id, license, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{license}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id} )
